copySink.preCopyScript:
BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'HumanResources') EXEC('Create Schema [HumanResources]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[HumanResources].[Employee]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [HumanResources].[Employee] ([BusinessEntityID] int,
[NationalIDNumber] nvarchar(15),
[LoginID] nvarchar(256),
[OrganizationNode] Unsupported Type,
[OrganizationLevel] smallint,
[JobTitle] nvarchar(50),
[SickLeaveHours] smallint,
[CurrentFlag] bit,
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[BirthDate] date,
[MaritalStatus] nchar(1),
[Gender] nchar(1),
[HireDate] date,
[SalariedFlag] bit,
[VacationHours] smallint);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Person') EXEC('Create Schema [Person]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[Person].[Address]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [Person].[Address] ([AddressID] int,
[AddressLine1] nvarchar(60),
[AddressLine2] nvarchar(60),
[City] nvarchar(30),
[StateProvinceID] int,
[PostalCode] nvarchar(15),
[SpatialLocation] Unsupported Type,
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Production') EXEC('Create Schema [Production]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[Production].[Document]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [Production].[Document] ([DocumentSummary] nvarchar(4000),
[Document] varbinary(8000),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[FolderFlag] bit,
[FileName] nvarchar(400),
[FileExtension] nvarchar(8),
[Revision] nchar(5),
[ChangeNumber] int,
[Status] tinyint,
[DocumentNode] Unsupported Type,
[DocumentLevel] smallint,
[Title] nvarchar(50),
[Owner] int);
